PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12862024-12-05SB&T
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Small Business and Tourism of DONALD WILLIAM CURRIE of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective January 8, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the reappointment by the Minister of Small Business and Tourism of DONALD WILLIAM CURRIE of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective January 8, 2025.
